import React, { useState, useEffect, Suspense } from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import { SunIcon, MoonIcon, LanguageIcon, BriefcaseIcon, AcademicCapIcon, SparklesIcon, CodeBracketIcon, IdentificationIcon, LinkIcon, MapPinIcon, UserGroupIcon, ChatBubbleLeftRightIcon, LightBulbIcon, RocketLaunchIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; // Added more icons // Placeholder for 3D elements or visual flourishes const FloatingShape = ({ className }) => (
); function App() { const { t, i18n } = useTranslation(); const [darkMode, setDarkMode] = useState(() => { const savedMode = localStorage.getItem('darkMode'); return savedMode ? JSON.parse(savedMode) : true; // Default to dark mode }); useEffect(() => { if (darkMode) { document.documentElement.classList.add('dark'); } else { document.documentElement.classList.remove('dark'); } localStorage.setItem('darkMode', JSON.stringify(darkMode)); }, [darkMode]); const toggleDarkMode = () => setDarkMode(!darkMode); const changeLanguage = (lng) => { i18n.changeLanguage(lng); }; const currentLanguage = i18n.language; const linkedinProfileUrl = "https://www.linkedin.com/in/joaopedrolopesgoncalves/"; const githubProfileUrl = "https://github.com/DevJpLg"; // Placeholder for actual projects from GitHub const projectsPlaceholder = [ { id: 1, title: "GitHub Project 1", description: "Description for project 1 from GitHub.", tech: ["React", "Node.js"], image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300x200/FF00FF/FFFFFF?Text=Project+1", link: "#" }, { id: 2, title: "GitHub Project 2", description: "Description for project 2 from GitHub.", tech: ["Python", "API"], image: "https://via.placeholder.com/300x200/00A9FF/FFFFFF?Text=Project+2", link: "#" }, ]; return (
{t('hero.name').split(' ')[0]} {t('hero.name').split(' ')[2]} {/* João Gonçalves */}
